name: Nayndralik- Talim´s Trial
description:
And thus, the villagers only had one chance to defeat Masama, save Puno and survive. They summoned Talim.

As Talim, the oldest ice guardian of Nayndralik, it is your undertaking to defeat the evil aura, Masama, that attacked Nayndralik´s most sacred life form: Puno.

Collect runes that can
unlock new movement at the shrines and
complete the arena that keeps Masama in existence.

Can Talim pass his trial?
